item.description:
Local artists offer Open Studios for all to peruse their home studios.  Join me to take in the sights and sounds of our Fort Point Arts Community.  We'll start out by meeting at the FPAC gallery, and leave from there.  A lot of these studios are lofts in converted warehouses and are quite unique.  You will also have an opportunity to purchase paintings, photos, jewelry, etc.

Please be aware that there will be a lot of stair climbing involved as most of these buildings are old and do not have elevators.

 

http://www.fortpointarts.org/open-studios/

 

After all that walking and stair-climbing, we can reward ourselves with a trip to Lucky's Lounge.  The creative dishes are reasonably priced and delicious.  We can plan on sitting down to dinner around 6:30. Please feel free to join us for dinner only if you like.

Located  at 355 Congress Street, stepping into Lucky's is like a time trip in to the era of the Rat Pack.  There will even be a musical tribute to "Old Blue Eyes" starting at 7 and running until 10.

http://www.luckyslounge.com/wp/

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Fort Point Arts Assoc. Open Studios followed by Dinner at Lucky's Lounge
